THANK_YOU_ALL_DONATIONS_ARE_WELCOME.message: Obrigado. Todas as doações são bem-vindas.

FLAVOUR_1_MESSAGE.message: Peace be with you, brother. Please select an amount to donate to the Guardians of the Free Spirit.

FLAVOUR_1_TITLE.message: DONATE. The Guardians of the Free Spirit humbly request your charity to support our monasteries.

FLAVOUR_2_TITLE.message: FEELING GENEROUS? War Orphan's Support needs your help to keep up its essential work.

FLAVOUR_2_MESSAGE.message: Please select an amount to donate to War Orphan's Support, and end the suffering of children all over the galaxy.

FLAVOUR_0_TITLE.message: DONATE! The Church of The Celestial Flying Spaghetti Monster needs YOUR money to spread the word of god.

FLAVOUR_3_MESSAGE.message: Please select an amount to donate to the GreenWatch, and end the pollution of our galaxy.

FLAVOUR_4_MESSAGE.message: Please select an amount to donate.

FLAVOUR_0_MESSAGE.message: Please select an amount to donate to the Church of the Celestial Flying Spaghetti Monster.

FLAVOUR_3_TITLE.message: CONTRIBUTE. The Friends of the Galaxy 'Ban Military Drives' campaign needs your money.

FLAVOUR_4_TITLE.message: DONATE! Save our species. Stop the carnage of newly settled worlds.
